DOC.brief_summary: This assessment Pharmacokinetics single oral dose VIMOVO healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Pharmacokinetics Single Oral Dose VIMOVO Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open-label , Single-center Study Assess Pharmacokinetics Single Oral Dose VIMOVO ( 250 mg Naproxen/20 mg Esomeprazole ) Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 55 year Capable understanding comply Clinical Study Protocol Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 weight 50 100 kg Previous enrollment present study Receipt another investigational product within 4 week study plan participate another study time study Female subject positive urine pregnancy test
